::DrillBit::

"Are you kidding? I always have time for you."
He walked to the mess hall, and found their table. He sat down.
He was remembering the night their relationship started. They had been
in the mess hall at the old cave. They both got drunk, and spent the
night making out. Hmmm, that wasn't very romantic.
He placed a hand on hers. 
"Hello, love. I'm sure you would like to be caught up, and I could use
an explination of how you are here. Its a marical!"

::Dollon::

"Ok. I'm going to get some shut eye."
He heads to his room, and sleeps.
